appDescription.message: Take selfies with your camera using our free fun effects.

appShortName.description: The short_name (maximum of 12 characters recommended) is a short version of the app's name.

browserActionTitle.description: The title of the browser action button

msg_10.message: Just select camera effect and click button

msg_12.message: Select photo effect, adjust min-max values via slider, and click "Take photo" button to take your snap.

msg_13.message: Can't Take Photos Right Now, Sorry...

msg_6.message: Please, notice, selfies session is running already, all your data will be lost after you start new one.

msg_9.message: Be sure no other websites and programs, that may be using your camera (Skype, chat, etc.)
